name: Underworld Girl, Yuri
ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your characters becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Now, let's go. I'll protect you.

name: Kanade Sending Everyone Off
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Death》 characters get "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Have you overcome your lingering emotions?

name: "Messenger of God" Angel
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is not a 《Death》 character, at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your waiting room. (The revealed cards are returned to their original place)
flavor_text: Hideous, isn't it?

name: Battle Meeting, Kanade
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other characters you have is one or less, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]"
flavor_text: That plan sounds perfect for me.

name: Yui's Sex Appeal?
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If the revealed card is a climax, this card gets -3000 power until end of turn. (The revealed card is returned to its original place)
flavor_text: It's not a gag!

name: Angel Wings, Kanade
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Death》 characters.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Time to Part Ways" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Student Council》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: No, they're decorations. I was told it would make me appear more angelic.

name: End of the Confrontation, Kanade
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, choose one of your 《Death》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Yuri has overcome the weight pulling her down.

name: A Good Understanding, Iwasawa & Hisako
ability: 【CONT】 Memory If you have a card in your memory, this card gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: Iwasawa: "This is my life…"

name: Worrying Kanade
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose another of your 《Death》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Cool Beauty, Iwasawa
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your memory] When a card named "Memories of Gldemo" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Realizing a Dream, Yui" in your hand, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavor_text: …I couldn't sing my beloved songs……that's all.

name: Kanade Standing Still
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your characters with "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]", and that character gets +1 soul until end of turn.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Memories of Gldemo" is in your climax area, all of your 《Death》 characters get +3500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's memory.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Somewhere, Someday" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters, and put it into your opponent's stock.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's characters on the center stage, return it to your opponent's hand, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

flavor_text: Relay this to all Battlefront members: Stay alert at all times.

name: Genius Hacker, Takeyama
ability: 【CONT】Clock@ Alarm When this card is the top card of your clock, all of your 《Death》 characters get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn."
flavor_text: Yuri: "Codename Takeyama will be on the team."

name: Hinata Looking Out for Allies
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavor_text: I won't leave you behind.

name: Moodmaker, Hinata
ability: 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your 《Death》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: What about you is seductive.

name: Rivalry, Noda
flavor_text: You bastard… You're the jerk that insulted Yurippe and refused to enlist!!

name: Codename Takeyama
ability: 【CONT】 If this card is on the stage, this card's card name will also be regarded as "Christ".

name: Kanade's Friend, Yuri
ability: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of the center stage, this card gets +500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]"
flavor_text: So don't be so harsh on her… Right?

name: Hinata's Response to Her Feelings
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavor_text: I'll marry you!!

name: Proud Kunoichi, Shiina
flavor_text:
This will make the gap in
our concentration levels obvious.

name: Takamatsu Not Taking Off Enough
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavor_text: I'll take my pants off next…

name: Unknown Identity, TK
flavor_text: Come on!! Let's dance!!

name: Famous Battlefront Combination, Hinata & Otonashi
ability: 【AUTO】 [Return two characters from your waiting room to your deck. Shuffle your deck afterwards] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Otonashi: "Say 'Hi' to Yui if you see her."
Hinata: "Sure thing. I should have a bunch of luck stored up,
so I'll be sure to use it."

name:
Matsushita
the Fifth
ability: 【CONT】 Alarm When this card is the top card of your clock, and your level is 2 or higher, all of your characters with "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]" get the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is lower than or equal to the level of this card, you may 【REVERSE】 that character."
flavor_text: What should we do?

name: Operation Tornado
ability: Brainstorm Reveal three cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. Choose one level X or lower 《Death》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of 《Death》 characters revealed among those cards.
flavor_text: I had no idea… buying time could be so intense…

name: Jet Engine
ability: You may choose one of your characters, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 2 or lower characters, and put it into your opponent's waiting room.
flavor_text: Yuri: "Man, this stinks."

name: Please call me Christ
ability: If the number of 《Death》 characters on your stage is three or less, this card cannot be played from your hand.
Choose a card from your opponent's waiting room, and put it into your opponent's memory. Put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: Yuri: "Well done, Takeyama."

name: After the Battle
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COME BACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: Wha-!! Cu-!?

name: Memories of a Past Life
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: Yuri: "I just can't… forgive God."

name: Underworld Battlefront
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
（【COME BACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: "Now they can leave this world… without any difficulty…"

name: Fulfilled Feelings
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I had been living a life that was worthwhile. My reason to live had been right next to me…"

name: "Little Braver" Yui
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of climax cards in your waiting room is six or more, this card gets -1 level in your hand.
【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on stage from your hand, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: But I always admired people who could do a German Suplex…

name: Kanade Tachibana
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Somewhere, Someday" is placed on your climax area, if this card is on your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Death》 character, and put it on any position of your stage. Shuffle your deck afterwards.

name: Sekine Loves Pranks
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: If this mission fails, no one can eat for a week!

name: Powerful Performance, Irie
ability: 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: That's right-!

name: Sub-leader, Hisako
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.
【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: But now we've got a new song.

name: "Crow Song" Iwasawa
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.
【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects.
flavor_text: Did you hear about someone's memories?

name: Kanade Waking Up
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Student Council》 characters you have.
flavor_text:
It's miraculous that the me who
made that promise awoke…

name: Somewhere, Someday
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Yuri Nakamura
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have a card named "Heart of the World" on your climax area, deal one damage to your opponent, and this card gets +1500 power until end of your opponent's next turn. (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Should I be happy…? Or get mad…?

name: MAX Tension, Shiina
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and put that character on top of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: Cute---!!

name: Student Council President, Otonashi
ability: 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】.)
flavor_text: Then stop whining and do something about it. You have something you want to do, right?

name: Demonic Commander, Yuri
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power.
【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Jet Engine" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: I won't send you flying if you say it just like that.

name: Heart of the World
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【COME BACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: Shut down these computers. Do it right now!!

name: "Graduation Ceremony" Kanade & Yuri
flavor_text: Yuri: "Good Job, Kanade."

name: Battlefront Rest, Yuri
ability: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Time for a quick breather...

name: From Now On, Kanade
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: What's next?

name: Tomboy, Yui
ability: 【ACT】 ［(1)］ This card gets +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: But sir~

name: Bond of Many Lifetimes, Otonashi
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand to your waiting room] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Death》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn
flavor_text: Well, I guess they aren't as bad as I first thought.

name: Otonashi's Close Friend, Hinata
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Death》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 Bond／"Tomboy, Yui" ［(1)］ （When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Tomboy, Yui" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: Seems to have taken a shine to you.

name: Proof That One Cannot Die, Kanade
ability: 【CONT】 The character facing this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore ［Put a character from your hand into your waiting room］".
flavor_text: Hand Sonic

name: Friendly Combination, Sekine & Irie
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: Irie: "Eh!?"

name: Big Fan of Gldemo, Yui
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power.
flavor_text: Girls Dead Monster is amazing, it's Gldemo for short!

name: Charisma Vocalist, Iwasawa
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters, return it to your opponent's hand, and at the end of turn, put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: This is my life… I wanted to sing like this…

name: Past Formidable Enemy, Kanade
flavor_text: Then, I'll go do it.

name: Like an Elder Sister, Hisako
flavor_text: We're getting bored here.

name: Girl Known as "Angel", Kanade
ability: 【CONT】 Memory During your turn, if you have a card in your memory, this card gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: …I'm not an angel.

name: 2nd Generation Vocalist, Yui
ability: 【AUTO】 ［Put the top card of your deck into your clock］ When this card attacks, if a card named "Operation Tornado feat. Yui" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, until end of turn this card gets +4000 power and your opponent cannot use "【AUTO】 Encore". （Your opponent cannot use the "【AUTO】 Encore [(3)]" rule either.)
flavor_text: Nice to meet ya!

name: Girl Standing Up Against Fate
flavor_text: Yuri: "I hope this will be our last battle."

name: Leader of Gldemo, Iwasawa
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 2 or higher characters in front of this card get +1000 power.
【CONT】 Memory If the number of cards in your memory is three or more, this card gets the following ability. "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power."
flavor_text: OK, shall we begin!

name: "Maradona" Yui
ability: 【CONT】 Memory If the number of 《Death》 characters in your memory is two or more, this card gets +500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +1000 power."
flavor_text: Prepare to get your butts cleaned!!

name: Tenshi's Mabo Tofu
ability: Search your deck for up to three 《Death》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. Choose two cards from your hand, and put them into your waiting room.
flavor_text: I like Mabo Tofu?

name: Operation Tornado feat. Yui
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: No, I can sing it right.

name: Fujimaki & Ooyama
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
flavor_text:
Fujimaki: "You've got some guts,
smart-mouthin' to Yurippe."

name: Thinner in Clothes, Takamatsu
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Death》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Yuri: "He's actually stupid."

name: Baseball Boy, Hinata
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, put this card into your memory.
flavor_text: Great, change pitchers.

name: Gone Unnoticed, Fujimaki
flavor_text: It feels like no one would notice if I vanished.

name: Releasing Oneself, Takamatsu
ability: 【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: Hinata: "Whatever, just get dressed."

name: Yuri Defying God
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Battle with Shadows" is in your climax area, you may choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Right! Let's go!

name: Cheerful Dancer, TK
flavor_text: Dancing in the shadow!

name: Just Like Sisters, Kanade & Yuri
ability: 【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot play event cards and "Backup" from hand.
flavor_text: Yuri: "…but I'm kinda happy… You called me Yuri."

name: Battle with Shadows
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: Quit goofing off and help out!

name: Model Student, Kanade
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, this card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Death》 characters
flavor_text: Second period's about to start.

name: Yuri's Powerful Draw?
ability: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if the number of 《Death》 characters you have is two or more, choose one of your characters in battle, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by your level.

【ACT】【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 ［(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room］ (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.)
flavor_text: I got number one!

name: Otonashi & Kanade in Winter
ability: 【CONT】 Memory If the number of cards in your memory is three or more, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【ACT】 [【REST】 one of your characters] This card gets +1000 power until end of turn."

【AUTO】 [(1)] During your turn, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a level 2 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it on the top of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: Otonashi: "Everyone's headed towards a new life."
